name: GET a non-existent book by ID as an admin

testSteps.description: Given admin user wants to get a non-existent book
When user calls service to get the book with ID 9999

restQuery.responseHeaders:
Set-Cookie: JSESSIONID=CBDCA42F57EF2E7E9AE50B2BEABFE117; Path=/; HttpOnly
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-XSS-Protection: 1; mode=block
Cache-Control: no-cache, no-store, max-age=0, must-revalidate
Pragma: no-cache
Expires: 0
X-Frame-Options: DENY
Content-Type: text/plain;charset=UTF-8
Content-Length: 14
Date: Sun, 05 Jan 2025 06:58:02 GMT
Keep-Alive: timeout=60
Connection: keep-alive

testSteps.description: Then user expects response status to be 404
And user expects response should contain a "Book not found" message

title: GET a non-existent book by ID as an admin
